ygData.subject: level 29
ygData.msgSnippet: ... No fizzles at all?  wow.  I think I maxed out my Evocation specialization and I still get fizzles now and again.  I figure I m not going to use the new DD
ygData.messageBody:
> >
>
>Yep, I also just got 29. Nice too feel needed with your group Teles. :)
>
>I have not had any problem with fizzles since about level 16, so I'm
>using Inferno Shock and loving it. I don't know what good Thunder Strike
>is, though. Is it just useless?
>
>Too bad I failed all my research attempts for level 29 spells. But I
>think I'll probably keep using column of Lightning as my AE anyway.
>

No fizzles at all? wow. I think I maxed out my Evocation specialization
and I still get fizzles now and again. I figure I'm not going to use the
new DD until 30. I find it more efficient to use the frost shock for now
because we can cast it soo much more at this point.

Yeah, it was a real nice surprise, but I was able to make my 29lvl AE spells
when I was 24! I think I really lucked out on that one. So I was holding
it in the bank all this time.

I'm not looking forward to "hell-level" are you? ;P

-- Lim'Dul
29 Wizzie Veeshan
Fellowship of Peace
